data.name: Star Wars Galaxies™: The Complete Online Adventures
data.detailed_description:
Be the hero of your own Star Wars™ adventures in a galaxy far, far away. Star Wars Galaxies: The Complete Online Adventures is the most complete Star Wars Galaxies experience ever, and now includes An Empire Divided™, Jump to Lightspeed™, Rage of the Wookiees™, and Trials of Obi-Wan™, plus the all new Star Wars Galaxies™ Trading Card Game: Champions of the Force!


    Now included: The Premium Plus Pack

    The most complete Star Wars Galaxies™ experience ever - including five exclusive vehicles based on the movies and an exclusive player house:

    • Your own Mustafarian Underground Bunker† player house (one per account)
    • Your own Varactyl Mount† (one per account)
    • Your own Lava Flea Mount† (one per account)
    • Your own personal AT-RT† in-game transportation (one per account)
    • Your own Queen Amidala Transport Ship†† (one per character)
    • Plus, a General Grievous Wheel Bike††, a two-seater with room for you and a friend, the same one seen in Star Wars™ Episode III: Revenge of the Sith™ (one per character)

    The Complete Online Adventures Premium Plus Pack Digital Download includes the original game Star Wars Galaxies™: An Empire Divided™ and all of the expansions: Jump to Lightspeed™, Rage of the Wookiees™, and Trials of Obi-Wan™. Thirty (30) days of game time is included with purchase (new accounts only; excludes existing game and Station Access accounts).


    In Star Wars Galaxies:

  • Experience the complete Star Wars Galaxies game: "An Empire Divided™," the expansions "Jump to Lightspeed™," "Rage of the Wookiees™," and "Trials of Obi-Wan™".
  • Embark on adventures inspired by the classic trilogy, the prequel movies including Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith™ and the new horror novel, Death Troopers.
  • Undertake hundreds of Star Wars missions to places like Jabba's Palace, the Ewok Village, the Mos Eisley Cantina, the royal city of Theed and Hoth!
  • Work for, or against, classic characters like Darth Vader, Jabba the Hutt, Han Solo and Princess Leia.
  • Race speeder bikes, swoop bikes, landspeeders and podracers, or mount creatures like banthas and dewbacks.
  • Master the wild with exclusive new abilities that let you create and customize your own beastly companion.
  • Plus, join your friends in all new heroic encounters battling such enemies as IG88, the Tusken King, Exar Kun, and Axkva Min and the Death Troopers invasion.

In the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game:

The Galactic Civil War continues on a whole new playing field with the introduction of the Star Wars Galaxies™ Trading Card Game and its first release, Champions of the Force, the first ever online Star Wars trading card game.

  • Choose your allegiance from one of four factions, Rebel, Imperial, Jedi or Sith, and build your own Light or Dark side digital card decks
  • Collect more than 250 beautifully detailed original Star Wars-themed digital cards
  • Challenge your skills online in solo play, or join with friends in epic one-on-one matches, cooperative Heroic Encounters and even official tournaments
  • Discover more than 20 digital loot cards in the first release that are redeemable for fantastic digital items within the Star Wars Galaxies massively multiplayer online game for players with a Star Wars Galaxies account in good standing*
  • Plus, all Star Wars Galaxies subscribers with current, valid, paid accounts in good standing are eligible to automatically receive five digital trading card Booster Packs each month included with their paid Star Wars Galaxies subscription at no additional cost

data.short_description: Be the hero of your own Star Wars™ adventures in a galaxy far, far away. Star Wars Galaxies: The Complete Online Adventures is the most complete Star Wars Galaxies experience ever, and now includes An Empire Divided™, Jump to Lightspeed™, Rage of the Wookiees™, and Trials of Obi-Wan™, plus the all new Star Wars Galaxies™ Trading Card...

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Pentium III 1 GHz or AMD Athlon 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 32 MB 3D Graphics card with Hardware Transform and Lighting (T&L) Capability
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 4.25 GB of free hard drive space required. Please allow an additional 500 MB of free space after installing the game for the Windows swap/page file and additional patch downloads
  • Sound: PCI, USB, or Onboard Audio Device
  • Other Requirements: Star Wars Galaxies is an Internet-only game, requiring players to connect to Sony Online Entertainment servers via their own Internet connections for which they are responsible. SOE and LEC do not ensure continuous or error-free access or availability of any game content, feature, game-play or server and may change, modify, disable, suspend or remove any such content, feature, game-play or server in its sole discretion. Additional recurring subscription fees and valid credit card required.

data.legal_notice:
*Active or former Star Wars Galaxies or Station Access™ subscription required. Former Star Wars Galaxies or Station Access subscribers with accounts in good standing are also able to access and play the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game. Star Wars Galaxies or Station Access accounts no longer in good standing may result in inability to play, use or access Star Wars Galaxies trading cards. Internet connection required. Players are responsible for all applicable internet fees. Additional recurring subscription fees apply to Star Wars Galaxies and Station Access accounts. Bonus loot card offers limited to one per account/character. Items are non-tradable and non-transferable. Booster pack cards included at no additional cost with valid, active Star Wars Galaxies subscription are non-transferable and non-tradeable. Additional starter packs and booster packs sold separately. Star Wars Galaxies and the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game are digital files only. No physical boxes, trading cards, disks, software, documentation or other tangible materials will be sent to you. The Star Wars Galaxies: The Complete Online Adventures Premium download does not include all the bonus features included in the original Star Wars Galaxies: The Complete Online Adventures retail release.

**First 30 days subscription fees included for new subscribers/accounts only (does not apply to existing accounts and/or SOE Station Access subscribers). All terms and conditions to play the game apply at all times.

†One AT-RT per account.

††One Queen Amidala (J-Type 327 Nubian) Transport per character. (Item is non-tradable and non-transferable)

‡One General Grievous Wheel Bike per character (Item is non-tradable and non-transferable)

‡‡One bonus loot card redeemable for player choice of Rebel or Imperial flight suit in Star Wars Galaxies per character. (One per account; item is non-tradable and non-transferable)
